reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Strengthening the self-determination of the indigenous Cabécar people through local capacity building and sustainable access to clean solar energy in the tropical rainforest of Talamanca, Costa Rica.
Stärkung der Selbstbestimmung des indigenen Cabécar Volks durch lokalen Kapazitätsaufbau und nachhaltigem Zugang zu sauberer Solar-Energie im tropischen Regenwald von Talamanca, Costa Rica.

description.narrative: Strengthening the self-determination of the indigenous Cabécar people through local capacity building and sustainable access to clean solar energy in the tropical rainforest of Talamanca, Costa Rica.
